attributes.action: School should not be compulsory till at least there is a vaccine ready.
attributes.background: There is still so many new cases arises day by day, the risk is still the same, and further the winter will make the situation more worst, so School should NOT make COMULSORY until December or at least there is a vaccine ready.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

No prosecution for parents that remove child from school during a pandemic: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300399

Keep schools closed in the UK until an effective Cov-19 vaccine is available: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319292
